title: What is scientific approach in research? - Quora

response.answer_text: The scientific method has the following steps: Make an observation.Ask a question about that observation.Propose a possible answer to the question, we call that a hypothesis.Design an experiment or an obervation process to address the question.Collect data, if the data supports the hypothesis, go to the next question. If the data does not support the hypothesis, return to step 3 and propose an alternative hypothesis.Rinse and repeat!!
